address.streetAddress: The Harrison Plan, The Estates at Hutsfield

location.fullValue: The Harrison Plan, The Estates at Hutsfield

data.description: Meticulously maintained, spacious brick ranch in the sought after Stoneleigh Subdivision. This large lot backs to wooded commons. The flowing open floor plan is perfect for entertaining and much of the main lever has hardwood flooring. The large kitchen has granite countertops, stainless appliances, and an abundance of cabinets, and it walks out to the morning room that offers lots of sunlight and overlooks the stamped concrete patio. The full-size basement is extra deep and ready for finishing. Home has a full house generator, hot water heater 9/2023.
